long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change any text into any style using OpenAI's artificial intelligence.

(1) Acquire an OpenAI token from platform.openai.com.
(2) On the rephrAIser Options page, paste that key, and select your style.
(3) Go to any website, select some text, and right-click to rephrase it.
